description: Look for the encrypted cpassword value within Group Policy Preference files on the Domain Controller. This value can be decrypted with gpp-decrypt. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Findstr GPP Passwords
query: (process.executable:*\\findstr.exe AND process.command_line:*cpassword* AND process.command_line:*\\sysvol\\* AND process.command_line:*.xml*)
